title: White and Black
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hmm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, are you giving up, Karin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>N-, not yet! There has to be a way to win....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright, black wins 36 to 28! That means it’s my win!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>How frustrating....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that was a much more heated battle than I expected~. I’ve never thought so hard on an Othello game before, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Huh, it’s already this late. Karin-chan, let’s go home soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kanan-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You can’t just win and run away like that! Let’s play one more game, please!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
